meanings.definition: The bone of the upper arm or forelimb, forming joints at the shoulder and the elbow.
meanings.sent1: The humeri connect the shoulder to the elbow.
meanings.sent2: He felt pain in both humeri after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The humeri waved enthusiastically during the dance.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like the humeri of a giant, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The doctor carefully examined the humeri for any fractures.
